main event: A large, luminous object was observed at treetop level, making an undulating motion near Shekhalin Island, Hokkaido, Japan.
interesting points: The object was silent and the sighting lasted approximately 7 seconds.
The object could not be identified, as no comparison could be made with known aircraft.
Shortly before the sighting, three unidentified single-engine jet aircraft were reported in the same area, with one of the planes disintegrating at 12:27Z.
No radar plots were obtained immediately after the incident, and weather conditions at the time included a 1000 ft ceiling and 10 miles of visibility.
The sighting was verified by the Hokkaido Air Defense Division and further investigation was conducted to determine if it was a legitimate incident.
sighted object: a large, luminous object making an undulating motion at treetop level
